data.title: Lais Ribeiro will be the 4th Black model in history to wear the Victoria’s Secret Fantasy Bra
data.meta_description: The Brazilian model is making Victoria's Secret history.
data.text:
Victoria’s Secret has chosen Lais Ribeiro as the model who will be donning the 2017 Champagne Nights Fantasy Bra— the fashion show’s annual show-stopper, adorned in diamonds, crystals, and anything else ultra-expensive. This year’s bra, made of 18 karat gold, diamonds and sapphires, was designed by Mouawad Jewelry and is worth about $2 million.

ADVERTISEMENT

Ribeiro, made the announcement on Wednesday with a post on her Instagram.

Previous VS Angels who have worn the Fantasy Bra include Tyra Banks, Heidi Klum, Adriana Lima, Gisele Bundchen, and Alessandra Ambrosio.

The 27-year-old Ribeiro, a Brazilian native, is one of more than 15 Black models confirmed to be walking in this year’s show— which is slated to be it’s most diverse lineup to date.

ADVERTISEMENT

The Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show is set to air November 28 on CBS.
